website_summaries.verdict: They are only made for certain Jeep, Dodge, and Chrysler vehicles, but they offer top quality if your vehicle is one of these models.
pros: Made of solid molded construction for a precise fit and lasting performance
cons: They are somewhat expensive and fit a limited set of vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Original side steps for your Jeep Wrangler!
customer_reviews.text: This are the perfect fit for my Jeep Wrangler 2016! I've been looking for the original look for quite some time; personally I don't like the tubular designs. The dealer was charging me close to $300 for them plus $90 for installation Some other stores like 4 wheelers had prices up to $500 for them (aren't they crazy?). So stop looking out there this is the best deal so far! The installation of the steps is pretty straightforward; so easy to install with the required tools.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love these, the Mopar stuff just fits better and is made well!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality, better than I was expecting, really. Made from very thick blow-molded plastic, just like your fenders. These are WAY thicker than the fenders, at first I was convinced they had metal inside them because they are so stiff, but no. My rather large passenger is short and weighs a "classified" amount, and uses the built in step every time. NO flex or give at all. These are light and strong. Again, get the MOPAR stuff, it is just made better and they fit like a glove. 25 minute install time!
customer_reviews.author: John from Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: Mopar Jeep Wrangler Side Steps Running Boards Are High Quality MOPAR Parts
customer_reviews.text: These Mopar Jeep Wrangler Side Steps Running Boards are high quality MOPAR parts. These look Great on my JK. They arrived Very Fast to NE Ohio and these were a very good value. I highly recommend these. Thanks. DMWorrel
customer_reviews.author: DMWorrel

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: i love them. replaced my rotted out westin bars, the mopar steps went on so easily i was amazed. lines up with factory holes on the body, way more professional than aftermarket bars. made in canada, not china. looks great.
customer_reviews.author: tahoedawg

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. I'm 68 yrs old and it only took me about 15 min. each side to install. Very sturdy to stand on Helpful in getting into and out of my jeep jk
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my black 2013 Jeep Wrangler sport
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my black 2013 Jeep Wrangler sport. Was pretty easy for me to install but I'm 34 and in shape. Does require some strength to tighten up the. Lots when installing so if your not the strong type or battling any kind of arm injuries then I'd suggest having a local repair shop put them on for you as it will only take them a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: erik c

customer_reviews.title: 2013 Wrangler Sport running boards
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick installation. Have used them for a year and no problems so far. Installed them on a 2013 Jeep Wrangler Sport. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product fit perfectly and went on so easily. I wish that it would fit a little ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2013 Jeep Wrangler. This product fit perfectly and went on so easily. I wish that it would fit a little more securely, hence the one star ding, but it seems to be a great product. Very lightweight (good?) and matches well with the existing fenders. For some reason this was shipped by us postal service and they wouldnt deliver, so i had to make an inconvenient trip to the post office and it took two weeks to ship. Other than that, great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Yankee is a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Jeep not long ago and found my dog, Yankee, had a hard time getting in and out of the car by himself. I thought a running board might be a solution, giving him a step mid way in his leap between the ground and the seat and vice versa. It worked very well. The running boards were a perfect fit. Easy to install. Took about 15 minutes. Look great and very sturdy. Oh yea, they make my entry and exit much easier also.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Mopar but cheaper than the stealership
customer_reviews.text: If you want to dress up your jeep with mopar products and want to save money then these are for you. Fast install and helps protect the jeep from door dings too
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on a 2018 Jeep wrangler 2 door. Installed myself in less then 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Look great on my vehicle make the the vehicle look complete ...
customer_reviews.text: Look great on my vehicle make the the vehicle look complete as you can see. My husband was able to install within a short time easily and they are working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my 2014 Wrangler Sport. Took all of 10 minutes to install. You will need some metric sockets. Super strong, no movement bouncing 220 lbs on the rails. LOOKS GREAT and really dresses up the Wrangler. IMatches the fenders perfectly. I would highly recommend these boards.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - I took a quick look at it before ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - I took a quick look at it before installing and as always the pictures in the install instructions are nothing like the side of our Jeep (at least it's hard to follow). So I put it down & will revisit installing them when I have more time and more patience......
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Coladonato, CPA

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: We received the order within a few days of ordering. The running boards fit our 2016 Jeep Wrangler perfectly. The installation was a breeze! We highly recommend this product and seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were also easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The running boards fit my Wrangler Sport perfectly. Only issue was the clips for the front bolts didn't fit. However the running boards are very securely attached. They were also easy to install. Look great!
customer_reviews.author: The Great Kuvancho

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Mod Yet!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and so easy to install! It took me less than 10 minutes to install these with a standard socket set. There were only 2 bolts and 4 nuts per side, no drilling, and everything lined up perfectly. I installed these on my 2012 Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: The running boards installed very easy in about 15 minutes and look great and added ...
customer_reviews.text: The running boards installed very easy in about 15 minutes and look great and added bonus is that they keep tire splash from getting on the side of the Jeep. The only negative is that they are virtually useless as an aid to get into the Jeep. If you step onto the running board then you have to duck down to get into the Jeep. But they do make the Jeep look finished.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, look great, are sturdy, and installed in 15 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and make it look complete
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my jeep. Easy install and make it look complete. Sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Horace

customer_reviews.title: EASY BOLT-ON UPGRADE
customer_reviews.text: Easy install (30 minutes from opening the box), great fit and functionality, plus improves the appearance. Good product at a good price. THX.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hearn

customer_reviews.title: stepping up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Wrangler shortly after I got it. They look great and make getting in and out for my passangers much easier. There was only one thing wrong with them when I got them, the driver side running board back hole didn't line up perfectly with the body of the vehicle itself. I had to grind out about an quarter inch of metal in total before it lined up enough to get the bolt through. After that, it held quite well. I even tried bouncing on each side a few time to make sure it held fast. It's been over a month now and they're still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Synthespian

customer_reviews.title: The fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install took hubby 40 minutes ... great value and very pleased with shipping!!️ Ordered on Friday here by Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise Schiessl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Same as factory, Easy to install. Makes getting in and out a lot easier. Fits well in 2015 jeep wrangler 2 door. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: David Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these bad boys on my 2012 wrangler fit great no complaints. The package arrived in about a day and a half!! Came in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, 15 min installation per side
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, 15 min installation per side! The dealer wanted $350/side not including installation, these are the exact same ones from the dealer same part number!
customer_reviews.author: Dave p

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2011 Wrangler, so that my daughter could get in and out without help. They were exactly what I needed. She can easily get in and out on her own now.
customer_reviews.author: mother of 2 girls

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: The rails do what they're supposed to do, and they look great! The directions could be just a tad bit better, but overall, I'm happy! Got it for a decent price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Boppa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems very solid and they only took me about 10-15 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A. Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Great side steps
customer_reviews.text: Great OEM side steps , easy to install no drilling. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The side steps arrived early and in perfect condition. The installation took maybe 20 minutes and they fit the factory holes on my Jeep perfect. They look great and complete my 2016 Wrangler. The running boards are MOPER and factory originals. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: jeep jk step bars
customer_reviews.text: fit my 2012 jeep wrangler great. these will never rust or rot. very hard and they are oem parts. really make the jeep look complete.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 star if the packaging did a better job. Items shifted and scratched each other during ...
customer_reviews.text: Easiest install ever! Lines up perfectly. Would be 5 star if the packaging did a better job. Items shifted and scratched each other during transit.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation for one person, only about 30 minutes total.
customer_reviews.text: They look like they came on the Jeep from the factory, great quality and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Fast shipping. Fits perfectly. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OEM look
customer_reviews.text: Fit and looks like factory Running Board. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kane

customer_reviews.title: Mopar side steps
customer_reviews.text: Mopar factory part, fit perfect, everything aligned. 30 minute install, looks great, perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Csaszar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was so easy to put on even i could do it----fit like a glove..
customer_reviews.author: Perry M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for a jeep owner. He said it was easy to install. Looks great on his jeep. Makes getting in and out of his jeep very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Branc98

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and look great
customer_reviews.text: I received these and was able to install them in less than 45 minutes. Everything lined up perfectly and installation was quick and easy. They look awesome and it will make it so much easier for my 70 year old mother and my grandchildren to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Meek63

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove on a 2017 2 door Wrangler. It looks like they came on it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: daughters jeep
customer_reviews.text: christmas gift for my daughter. Easy for me to install and they match the factory wheel wells perfectly. It also makes it easy for her to get in and out of the Jeep as well as keeping the splash down.
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. Makes getting my jeep so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new side steps!! Match the fenders on my Jeep perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on our 2016 Jeep Saraha. Everything lined up as should. These are OEM Mopar. Installed less than 15 min with 10mm & 13 mm Sockets
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rae Buffington-DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for steps to help smaller people access our 2010 wrangler. These work great. Just enough area to put your foot on and lines up nicely with the fender flares. They make a world of difference when accessing the rear seat. Installation was a snap, the hardware was acceptable and everything lined up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: The running boards look and work great. I just came off a 2500 mile toad ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I had to do was remove the rock rails that came with my Rubicon. The running boards look and work great. I just came off a 2500 mile toad trip with my jeep and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Running Boards
customer_reviews.text: These running boards came with the mounting brackets already attached to the boards. Made the installation quick and easy. Took about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Walker

customer_reviews.title: better then a metal step, no rust!!!
customer_reviews.text: provided entrance to the back seat that is needed on a 2 door. some like it better for getting in to the front, I like them cause they protect the side of the jeep. had to remove the stock rock sliders on my 2013 rubicon , that was not hard ! they were a little scuffed up when I got them but decided to keep them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: jim miller

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for my 2007 wrangler. Very happy with results and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix66

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Jeep Wrangler Sport. The color and material matches the bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Side Steps
customer_reviews.text: Jeep originally bought without the running boards. I personally have gotten used to not having them (removed them from my previous Jeep) but I have recieved complaints from my passengers about the step "down" when exiting and not knowing how far the ground was in respect to their footing. So, I bought the side step for my passengers convenience. I do like the way they look and how they complete and blend in with both front and rear fenders (in addition may serve as a door guard).
customer_reviews.author: Knights4u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These running boards are great factory running boards. They were delivered in three days and only took 15mins to install on my wifes 2015 jeep wrangler sport. They are a really nice touch to finish off the jeep.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just what I needed!! Exactly as described. Quick delivery and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Ovee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The side steps were very easy to install. Very good quality. Looks great. Very happy. Came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent OEM Mopar brand side steps for Jeep Wrangler 2-dr Sport
customer_reviews.text: These side steps are Mopar OEM brand, at $235 shipping included. They are sturdy and good looking on my Jeep Wrangler 2-dr Sport. Installation was easy with supplied the hardware. Now it is much easier and safer for me to get in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Naru Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fit perfect at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Mario R. Barral

customer_reviews.title: quality part and easy assembly. It enhanced my 07 jeep wrangler quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast, quality part and easy assembly. It enhanced my 07 jeep wrangler quite well. I've bought several parts from Mopar and I am very pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Love

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit half hour had both installed. They look great
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Was not expecting the pair...what a bonus. Very simple to replace , took 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Guempel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them for my fiancé for Christmas and this is his favorite gift! They were easy to install and look great on his Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Kkrys23

customer_reviews.title: looks great, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: installs in less than 30 mins, the wife loves them, easier for kids to get in jeep. built very sturdy, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Built good and sturdy. They make it easy for people to get in and out of the back seat easy. It was also shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Mopar side steps
customer_reviews.text: They came within a week and were very easy to install,everthing fit perfectly .They are exactly what I was looking and hoping for,easy access for entry into the back seat,extra protection against door dings when parked next to other vehicles and also protects the sides from mud ,dirt and rocks.They are low maintenace and won't ever rust.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dahmen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had them installed in less the 20 minutes and that included getting the tools together.
customer_reviews.author: skipife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Hundreds less than dealer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Hundreds less than dealer. 2015 has frame already set up for the 13mm bolts. Dont know if other years are set up that way.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sneath

customer_reviews.title: Pre-drilled holes do not line up on 2012 Wrangler Sport 4WD
customer_reviews.text: Execellent quality running boards. However, the pre-drilled holes do not line up on my 2012 Jeep Wrangler Sport 4WD. Otherwise, they are very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife's new Jeep (2013). The look great, blend with the fenders, and are very sturdy & provide good traction getting in & out of the Jeep. A big help for my wife & kids getting in & out. Installation was a snap, too. Took about 20 minutes, including putting up my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These were great, they matched right up with my 2013 Jeep and only took a few minuets to install. Can't get much better than that...
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - keeps the mud off
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the looks, added benefit, no more mud flying up the side. I would highly recommend, unless you want to keep it muddy.
customer_reviews.author: John F Soave

customer_reviews.title: Looks complete now helps access
customer_reviews.text: Completes the Jeep and the install was about as easy as it gets. Now the girlfriend is much happier with her new Wrangler. After I installed I saw a notice about removing them before going off road. Oh well, the good news is that you can!
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in about an hour,they look great,will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ed White

customer_reviews.title: Too easy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these running boards for my 2 door Jeep. I received my order more quickly than expected, they were exactly what I was looking for and they were in great condition. They fit right on and it took less than 15 minutes to get them installed. I gave both sides a good bounce and they are as sturdy as you could ask for. I order from Amazon quite a bit...this is by far one of the BEST transactions I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W Glover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These side step running boards were the perfect fit for the jeep - just had to screw a few bolts and they were all set to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item very quickly, installed in about 30 minutes. All hardware included. These are factory Mopar running boards. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: theyre great they bolted right on in like 10 min very ruged too
customer_reviews.author: charles k schwartz

customer_reviews.title: great fit. Only basic tools required
customer_reviews.text: Fast install (less than 20 min), great fit. Only basic tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit on my 2010 Wrangler 2 door
customer_reviews.text: Now the kids can get in easier and the sides will stay cleaner. Hardest part was getting them unwrapped. Installed in 1/2 hour
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These went on very easily and they fow righ into the bumpers nicely. They are well built and hold 200 lbs. very well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reichel

customer_reviews.title: ... on but i know they fit and will look great. wanted to wait til spring to install cause ...
customer_reviews.text: still waiting to put them on but i know they fit and will look great. wanted to wait til spring to install cause of snow etc. want to weather protect correctly to help rit or rust iver years on jeep body where they attatch.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Young

customer_reviews.title: Mopar Side Steps --Look Great and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what those clips are for. I have a 2012 Jeep Sport S and there was no place to put the clips. My jeep came pre-drilled with the holes where the clips should go. In any event--they look wonderful and I got to install them myself. Not too handy with the tools but this was easy as cake!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: 2013 Wrangler Sport
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The running boards shipped very quickly. Super easy installation. Cons: The running boards looked like takes offs from another Jeep. They were not brand new (hardware shipped was new). This is the reason for 3 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: KsJeep

customer_reviews.title: Well satisfied with the service and product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the side step running boards for my 2013 Wrangler Sport on Sunday. Order was processed and shipped on Monday. I received them on Thursday. No drilling required, didn`t need the four clips that were included. About 15 minutes per side to install. Well satisfied with the service and product.
customer_reviews.author: David V. Greenlee

product_meta.title: Mopar Jeep Wrangler Side Steps Running Boards Molded
product_meta.description: These Molded Side Steps for the Jeep Wrangler are the production steps included on Sahara and optional on SE and Sport models. Made from durable black plastic with steel substructures, they provide stepping surface for easier entry and exit on Wrangler.
feature_bullets: Same as the steps that come with Wrangler Sahara, SE & SporT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
